column4: has anyone had any success in running gnome shell off a base xubuntu install?  It's a long story....
you should be able to install it..
you could have a dozen de's installed if you wanted. but you can get a lot of extra apps that way. but they should all work
okay, thanks.  I've ended up with an odd situation allowing me to run a more graphically intensive DE & I like Gnome shell
